mutants.code:
from collections import defaultdict

def max_total_greatness(N, M, P, songs, albums):
    d = defaultdict(list)
    for (a, p, v) in songs:
        d[a].append((p, v))
    dp = [[0 for _ in range(P + 1)] for _ in range(N + 1)]
    s = 2
    i = 1
    while i <= M:
        j = 0
        sg = 0
        while j < len(d[i]):
            k = P
            ps = d[i][j][0]
            gs = d[i][j][1]
            sg += gs
            while k >= ps:
                dp[s][k] = max(dp[s - 1][k], dp[s - 1][k - ps] + gs)
                k -= 1
            k = 0
            while k < ps:
                dp[s][k] = dp[s - 1][k]
                k += 1
            j += 1
            s += 1
        k = P
        while k >= albums[i - 1]:
            dp[s - 1][k] = max(dp[s - 1 - j][k - albums[i - 1]] + sg, dp[s - 1][k])
            k -= 1
        i += 1
    return dp[N][P]
